mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def get_most_frequent_words(text, stopwords, min_word_length, top_n):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopwords and len(word) >= min_word_length]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_counts.most_common(top_n)
    return top_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def get_most_frequent_words(text, stopwords, min_word_length, top_n):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopwords and len(word) >= min_word_length]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_counts.most_common(top_n)
    return top_words

import re
from collections import Counter

def get_most_frequent_words(text, stopwords, min_word_length, top_n):
    cleaned_text = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', text.lower())
    words = cleaned_text.split()
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stopwords and len(word) == min_word_length]
    word_counts = Counter(words)
    top_words = word_counts.most_common(top_n)
    return top_words
